text: @SenSchumer You should’ve watched WH press briefing today. She addressed this, as did Fauci several times during corona briefings. This is a red herring for those that are uninformed or using the virus as a political football. Continue pushing fear & ignorance #coronavirus #BacktoWorkAmerica
